lead_paragraph: Bayern Munich are desperate to avoid losing a third consecutive Champions League semi-final to Spanish opponents when they host Atletico Madrid on Tuesday but coach Pep Guardiola has his work cut out to end his time in Germany on a high.

headline.print_headline: Guardiola Out to End Semi-Final Misery Against Atletico
headline.main: Guardiola Out to End Semi-Final Misery Against Atletico
